mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_delivery_adbk WHERE email = #{email} AND delivery_adbk_ncm = #{delivery_adbk_ncm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_delivery_adbk (email, delivery_adbk_no, delivery_adbk_ncm, delivery_place_tlnum, delivery_place_adres, delivery_place_adres_detail) VALUES (#{email}, #{delivery_adbk_no}, #{delivery_adbk_ncm}, #{delivery_place_tlnum}, #{delivery_place_adres}, #{delivery_place_adres_detail})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(delivery_adbk_no) FROM tbl_delivery_adbk WHERE email = #{email}
